document.full_text: spotty inspections of the u.s. nuclear power industry allow plants to continue to operate even when there are known problems in their safety systems, a report by a group of u.s. scientists found.
document.title: complacency raises u.s. nuclear risks, report finds
lines_and_colors: spotty inspections of the u.s. nuclear power industry allow plants to continue to operate even when there are known problems in their safety systems, a report by a group of u.s. scientists found.
